name: App Game Kit V2
blurb: AGK is an easy to use cross platform game dev engine. Supporting OUYA, iOS, Android, Mac, Windows & Blackberry.

rewards.reward: I just want to back the project! // THANK YOU for your Pledge -  Approx $5 USD

*** AMAZING *** SECOND CHANCE EARLY BIRD DEAL // Due to popular demand and to celebrate reaching our initial funding goal we have created 200 more early bird deals. There will be no more of these deals so grab one of these while you can!!! The FULL App Game Kit Version 2 when it's completed (and access to Beta versions) + a TGC forum backer badge to show your kind support. Approx $39 USD
*** AMAZING *** EARLY BIRD DEAL // The FULL App Game Kit Version 2 when it's completed (and access to Beta versions) + a TGC forum backer badge to show your kind support. Approx $39 USD
STANDARD BACKER DEAL // The FULL App Game Kit Version 2 when it's completed (and access to Beta versions) + a TGC forum backer badge to show your kind support. Approx $45 USD

COMBO BACKER // This is the same as the Bronze backer level. We're just adding this to make it clear that pledges of \u00a335 and over all receive V1 and V2 of AGK! // The FULL App Game Kit Version 2 when it's completed (and access to Beta versions) + acces to AGK V1 + a TGC forum Bronze backer badge to show your bronze medal support! Approx $54 USD
BRONZE BACKER // The FULL App Game Kit Version 2 when it's completed (and access to Beta versions) + a TGC forum Bronze backer badge to show your bronze medal support! Approx $54 USD

SILVER BACKER // The FULL App Game Kit Version 2 when it's completed (and access to Beta versions) + a A4 laminated command crib sheet + a TGC forum Silver backer badge to show your super silver support! Approx $86 USD

GOLD BACKER // Special mention in the AGK Gold credits section + a limited edition AGK T-Shirt + The FULL App Game Kit V2 version when it's completed (and access to Beta versions) + a A4 laminated command crib sheet + a TGC forum Gold backer badge to show your awesome gold support! Approx $157 USD

ACADEMIC BACKER // License to use AGK Version 2 (and access to Beta versions)  on up to 30 PCs in your choice of school/college or university.  A unique certificate signed by the whole TGC team. Special mention in the AGK Academic credits section + 30 A4 laminated command crib sheets  + a TGC forum Academic backer badge to show your wonderful support! Approx $391 USD

GOD LIKE BACKER // A unique certificate signed by the whole TGC team. Special mention in the AGK GOD LIKE credits section! A limited edition AGK T-Shirt. The FULL App Game Kit Version 2 when it's completed (and access to Beta versions) + a laminated command crib sheet + a TGC God Like forum backer badge to show your faith in the project! Approx $783 USD

BRONZE INDUSTRY BACKER // Ideal for a large Industry Corporate who wants to sponsor the further development of the tool. You will receive clear credits within AGK for your kind support of the development. A unique certificate signed by the whole TGC team + 3 limited edition T-Shirts + 3 laminated command crib sheets + a site license to use App Game Kit Version 2. Approx $1566 USD

SILVER INDUSTRY BACKER // Ideal for a large Industry Corporate who wants to sponsor the further development of the tool. You will receive clear credits within AGK for your kind support of the development. A unique certificate signed by the whole TGC team + 5 limited edition T-Shirts + 5 laminated command crib sheets + a site license to use App Game Kit Version 2. Approx $3,130 USD

GOLD INDUSTRY BACKER // Ideal for a large Industry Corporate who wants to sponsor the further development of the tool. You will receive clear credits within AGK for your kind support of the development. A unique certificate signed by the whole TGC team + 10 limited edition T-Shirts + 10 laminated command crib sheets + a site license to use App Game Kit Version 2. Approx $7,830 USD
